track.name: Nobody Loves Me But My Mother
comments: Back in the 1980's, BB was absolutely incredible every time I saw him perform live.   Like a man possessed, he played with a wild fire.   His live band back then was out of this world.
I Know what BB is saying ! I met BB in Perth, Australia. back in the 70s. I was the only person in the theartre and BB emerged from behind the curtain !
and mom gets mad at me , too....
Sometimes I think my mom is jiving too.
Classic B.B.!! King of the blues!
Lol! at comment below.  Thats SO sad. She may not be :)
i am pretty sure my mother is jiving!
aaaahhh... why was this cut short!
blues master, hope then more people love me like my mom do
YO SOLO QUIERO ESCUCHAR UN BLUES.........
This song always makes me laugh. The fact that his momma might be jiving too is just hilarious.
Nao sei de que gosto mais. Das musicas, da voz ou da guitarra.

tag.name: nobody loves me but my mother
